rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0001
rows.name:
Dammit! How did Metsu's
Devices get so close to the palace?!

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0002
rows.name:
What's the plan?
You gonna use my power?

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0003
rows.name:
No, that would cause great damage to the
Royal Capital. It'll be a pain, but
we'll take them down, one by one.

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0004
rows.name:
But shouldn't we be helping
to evacuate the civilians?!

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0005
rows.name:
We can leave that to the Iiran army.
They know the lay of the land
better than we do.

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0008
rows.name:
It seems they haven't attacked from the
rear of the palace. First, let's drive
Gargoyles out of residential area ahead.

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0009
rows.name:
Then we'll swing around to
the shopping district on the left...

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0010
rows.name: and then head straight for the main gate.

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0012
rows.name:
Everyone, let's go!
I'm not going to let these
Gargoyles tear our capital apart!
